project.name: ${project.artifactId}
project.description:
This maven module contains the WSDL and XSD's that will be used to generate the service. The service is created WSDL-first, since this allows us to both specify the WSDL as a interface independent of our language requirements (thus potentially creating a more portable and better-designed service) and specify the WS-SecurityPolicy assertions to secure the service.
Maven will jar the files from src/main/resources up for our use in other modules.
